                  java.lang.String ingredientDate,
                  java.lang.String ingredientLocation,
                  int ingredientAmount,
                  int ingredientUnit,
                  java.lang.String ingredientCategory)
        Ingredient constructor, takes in the description, date, location, amount, unit, and category of the ingredient
        Parameters:
        ingredientDesc - description of the ingredient
        ingredientDate - best before date of the ingredient
        ingredientLocation - storage location of the ingredient
        ingredientAmount - amount of the ingredient
        ingredientUnit - unit cost of the ingredient
        ingredientCategory - category of the ingredient
